task.title: How to make a fruit salad
task.shortdesc: This task will explain what you need and how to make an amazing fruit salad.

context.p: This recipe is for a perfectly balanced and delicious fruit salad.

You will need:
2 cups fresh strawberries
2 cups green seedless grapes
1 small canteloupe, cut into chunks
2 firm bananas, sliced
1/3 cup fresh 100% orange juice

step.cmd: In a large bowl, combine the fruit.
Pour the orange juice over the fruit and toss to coat all the fruit in juice.
Cover and refrigerate the salad until you are ready to eat it.
